attributes.action: Put a 6 month probation and have a referendum regarding the 20mph speed limits
attributes.additional_details: We want to have probationary periods on any speed limits implemented and suggested only on roads that would have any actual safety benefits like around schools. Blanket reductions in speeds are increasing congestion, increases pollution due to higher times spent in built up areas and frustration from drivers espicially when cyclists and pedestrians are not following safety rules
attributes.background: I want a referendum on any recommended speed limit changes and a probationary period of 6 months on the existing 20mph limits in wales and have specific rules depending on counties not a blanket country wide reduction. We need as the voters to have more control over the speed limits

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government and Welsh Parliament is responsible for.

The Welsh Parliament has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Parliament, you can find out more here: https://petitions.senedd.wales/
